attributes.action: To ensure all areas of UK receive same number of TV channels on Freeview.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All areas of the UK pay for a TV Licence at the same level. So what I want is for the government to provide adequate funds to ensure all areas of the UK are able to recieve the same number of channels.  Why should areas unable to receive all the channels pay the same Tv Licence rate?
